Title: Dunkerque LNG shutdown adds to industrial action-led French LNG terminal outages
Description: The Fluxys-operated 9.6 mtpa Dunkerque LNG terminal in France has shut down due to a workers’ strike for a period of 48 hours from Mar. 7, adding to the industrial action-led outages at France’s three other LNG terminals and curtailing its LNG supply availability.
Author: CK

Title: Finland’s Inkoo LNG terminal offers three spot slots for the second and third quarter of 2023
Description: Finnish gas transmission operator Gasgrid Finland is offering three spot slots out of a total of 10 LNG import slots in the second and third quarter of this year at its 1.6 mtpa Inkoo floating LNG import terminal after finalizing the schedule for booked capacity over the period.
Author: CK
